description: My place is close to Located conveniently minutes from Manhattan, and all major airports.  Shopping, night life, mass transit,restaurants,  and Astoria Park make my place an amazing place to stay while exploring the great city of New York. . You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the comfy bed, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Astoria Diamond
